name: Ferrin V1
description:
this is my first model that i made so please read carefully!!!! (you might recognize the artist also lol)

I am currently experimenting with the model right now as of writing, you must have "dragon" and "ferrin" in your poitive prompt or it will not work.

The model it self was trained on 23 nsfw and sfw high quality pictures of Ferrins, currently you can't change much the fur color as it will be same, and it works perfectly with CounterfeitV25_25.

anyways good luck with it.

(make sure to add "blue pussy" and "blue nipples" for the funni :)

and also RIP my 1070ti
